Who am I?

With my self-taught experience in several languages such as C++, Java, and PHP, I have honed my skills in mobile application development. Besides direct experience in mobile app development, my education also plays a crucial role in providing a strong foundation for my career.

Here is my educational background.

Computer and Network Engineering

SMKN 1 Badegan | 2020 - 2023
  • Studied Basic Computers and Networks, Computer Systems, and Basic Programming.
  • Studied WAN Technology, Network Services Technology, Network Infrastructure Administration, and Network Systems Administration.

Learn JavaScript Programming Basics

Certificate from dicoding.com | Valid until 2026
  • Studied Object-Oriented Programming (OOP).
  • Studied Functional Programming (FP), and others.

MikroTik Certified Network Associate

Certificate from MikroTik | Valid until 2025
  • Network Address Translation (NAT).
  • Quality of Service (QoS), and others.
